body:
Hi Martin,

Your message to the Radiance-online list came through as a damaged
attachment.  Can you resend just the text portion of the message -- not
as an attachment?  In general, it's not a good idea to send attachments
to a mailing list.  If someone wants to look at your file and you can't
put it on a website, you can mail it to people who request it
specifically.  That way, it doesn't get sent automatically to the entire
list.

Thanks,
-Greg
subject: [Radiance-general] problem reading attachment
